thread.title: Funniest Tweets About Super Bowl 2017 – Best Twitter Reactions to Superbowl
thread.title_full: Funniest Tweets About Super Bowl 2017 – Best Twitter Reactions to Superbowl

author: Lauren Alexis Fisher
title: Funniest Tweets About Super Bowl 2017 – Best Twitter Reactions to Superbowl
text:
Even if football isn't exactly your thing, Super Bowl LI had three things for everyone tonight: Lady Gaga's Halftime Show , the commercials and of course, Twitter. From sad Tom Brady to election references and even a George H.W. Bush appearance, there were plenty of tweets doing just as much entertaining as the game itself tonight. Below, the funniest Twitter reactions to #SuperBowlSunday:
1)
Hillary Clinton should have used some of her leftover campaign cash to buy 30 seconds where she just says "Still worried about my emails?"
— Isaac (@isaa ) February 6, 2017
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 2)
Me during the non-Gaga parts of the #SuperBowl pic.twitter.com/OnduDGXVwE
— Mike T (@majtague) February 6, 2017
